short ball at the hips, gets on top and nudges it to fine leg
good length and swinging away outside off, defended off the back foot
good length down leg side, beaten as he looks to flick
good length on an off stump line. Looked like an offcutter. Defended into the point region

he's hit a long hop straight to deep square. A short ball, down leg side and he nails this pull shot. For connection, anyway. He's placed it straight to KL Rahul there, who misses it on the first attempt and fishes with hards hands to try and grab this as close to his body as possible. Ends up jamming it into his ribs and holds on to his right
back of a length and in at off stump, defended off the back foot
full at middle stump, flicked to square leg

dropped at backward short leg. A tough chance for Rahul. To his right again. Flicks from a leg stump line, he leaps one-handed to his right and can't hold on as this flies quickly. Ashwin got this to dip quickly on a leg stump line
good length at middle stump, defended into the leg side
length on middle, clipped into the leg side
full at leg stump, flicked to square leg
good length and climbing up at middle stump. Dead-bats it on the front foot
flies to slip's left and he can't get his hands around this. Rohit Sharma at wide slip. Short ball in the corridor, slashes with not enough room and that's four

leading edge sails to the keeper's left. Length ball comes in at middle stump, he closes the face too soon on the flick. Slip is wide, Parthiv has gone down leg side with the angle and has to try and recover. His dive won't do
thick outside edge past second slip now! New favourite area for QDK. Back of a length ball just outside off, stabs at it away from the body and it's four more through third man

won't survive this time. Another aimless waft. Length ball climbing up in the corridor. No attempt to move the feet, no attempt to cover the line. Edge carries to Parthiv's left and he takes an easy one
good length and slight shape away outside off. Left alone
back of a length and in at leg stump. <strike>Shovelled</strike> Deflected off the thigh guard, into the square leg region
full at middle stump, tapped into the leg side
full on middle stump, driven to long-on
good length and flat outside off, defended off the back foot
good length outside off, drags it out to long leg with a sweep
back of a length on middle stump, tapped to midwicket off the back foot
good length and climbing up at him as he pushes forward. Drops it in front of short leg
good length and hooping in at leg stump. Struck on the pad as he looks to flick. That's going down
good length and just outside off. Left alone
shiny side outside. Swings away from a length, too wide to make him play
good length ball at off stump, gets on top of the bounce and flicks it to fine leg
bouncer dropped too short, he ducks under it
inswinger bowled full on leg stump. Defended on the front foot
tossed up outside off, shuffles and sweeps to long leg
full ball pushed through fast at middle stump. Hurriedly pushes it wide of short leg
chops it between his legs as he fails to get on top of the bounce. His legs were outside leg stump though. He was looking to cut as this spun in sharply
length on middle stump, clipped through midwicket
loopy full one on middle stump, flicked on the up to square leg
good length outside off, covers the line and defends on the back foot
good length and shaping away outside off. Defended off the back foot and Philander gets a loud call of no from Faf
good length and nipping away outside off. Defended without feet

mix-up! Good length and swinging in at the pad. Shovels it wide of midwicket and strolls down the pitch ball watching again! Faf won't even look at Philander. He is fuming after responding to that run. He makes the crease though as the throw is wide
full inswinger on the pads, flicked to deep square's right and a big loud call from Faf. Pandya puts in a slide and keeps it to two
good length and just outside off with the shiny side facing off side. Defended on the back foot
zips back from outside off and catches him on the back thigh. Looking to defend, beaten on the inside edge. Shami making it talk
good length outside off, defended off the back foot
length on middle stump, dabbed in front of leg slip off the back foot
carrom ball at a length, on leg stump. Defended into the leg side
back of a length at middle stump, defended off the back foot
goes on the back foot and this pings off his thigh guard to short leg. Spinning in at him and climbing too
good length outside off, defended on the front foot
back of a length at off stump, defended off the back foot
short and wide outside off, chops it into the pitch as he looks to punch on the up through cover
full outside off, no feet as he drives on the up. Gets it out to mid-off
good length at off stump, drives to mid-off's left and calls early for the run
full and swung in to a fifth stump line. He jams it back to the bowler off the toe-end
spits up at him as he looks to defend on the front foot. This was angled in outside off. They won't go back to him too much for sure, but he's hurting them on the front foot too
good length and fired wide outside off. Jumps behind the line and offers the pad
good length and dipping in the rough outside off, shuffles and defends on the front foot and is beaten on the inside edge. Cops it on the pad well outside
good length at off stump, defended into the leg side off the back foot
good length at off stump, defended into the leg side
full on leg stump, flicked to square leg
good length outside off, defended on the front foot
back of a length, angling into off stump, defended to midwicket
length ball close to off stump, opens his bat face and pushes it to the right of backward point
full outside off, driven to the left of mid-off, where Ishant slides to restrict Faf to one run
back of a length, angling into off stump, defended to mid-off
ooh, some extra bounce from a length. Angling into off stump again, and Philander jabs at it, leaning forward rather than taking a proper front-foot step. Thick inside edge rolls into the leg side
back of a length, close to off stump, defended into the point region
back of a length, slanting across to off stump, defended back to the bowler
full now, clipped with the turn to long-on
Nice flight just outside off, stretches out to push into the covers
a bit of flight and he's quickly out of his crease for another push down to long-on
nice length outside off, some sharp turn too as he comes forward to defend. Off the inside half of the bat to straight midwicket
too full now, outside off, stretches out and opens his bat face for a gentle push into the covers
back of a length, sixth-stump line, reaches out for a defensive push to backward point. India won't mind that
bouncer, Philander ducks under it and it loops tennis-ball-style to Parthiv
back of a length, angling into middle stump, defended back to the bowler
back of a length, angling into middle stump again, defended to short midwicket
in the blockhole, and an lbw appeal from Bumrah. Perhaps some bat on it. The appeal dies quickly, and there's no interest in a review. No bat, but that's missing leg stump by a long way
angles a length ball into the pads, clipped away through backward square leg
tossed up wide of off, overpitches, and Philander drives it to the cover boundary
full, on the stumps, blocked back to the bowler
floated up high and wide, drives again, bottom hand takes over, and he drills it back to the bowler, along the ground
quicker and flatter now, on off stump. Stays on the back foot and defends into the on side
length ball on off stump, stays back to clip to the left of square leg
tossed up on middle stump, clipped to midwicket
fullish, angling into middle and leg. Stays back to clip to square leg
fullish outside off, defended into the covers
exactly Pandya's effort here. Goes wide of the crease and spears it full at the stumps. Aborted lbw appeal because that was sliding down leg after Philander missed his flick
full, angling into off stump, driven to the left of mid-off, and Ishant makes another good diving stop
fullish, angling into off and middle, gets nicely behind it and defends to midwicket
full outside off, defended to mid-off
tossed up outside off, gets on the front foot to clip to the left of square leg
carrom ball on middle and leg, goes back to clip towards square leg
full now, on off and middle, blocked back to the bowler
tossed up on middle stump, clipped to long-on
down the track now, not quite to the pitch, flicks to the right of midwicket, where Kohli makes a diving stop
no turn, slides on towards off stump after pitching just short enough for Faf to go back and punch to deep point

another yorker, on off stump, and an lbw appeal that doesn't move the umpire. India have reviewed. Looked like either bat-boot or boot-bat. Which one is it? There is no boot at all. Just bat, the toe-end of it. Oh, well
back of a length, angling into off stump, defended towards mid-on
ooh, lovely. Fullish on off stump, straightens off the pitch. Looked to clip that with the angle, through midwicket, and ended up hitting it to cover off the leading edge
length ball on middle stump, lets it come on and clips to deep square leg
back of a length on off stump, defended into the covers
full, angling down leg, and Philander looks to flick and gets just enough bat on it to send it flying to the fine-leg boundary
good length and in at middle stump. Defended solidly on the front foot
good length and down leg side. Can't get bat on the flick. Pandya destroys the silent tension in the ground with a raucous appeal which is half a celebration. No one knows why
short and just outside off. Taps it to cover's left
good length and in at off stump. Defended into the covers
good length and in at off stump. Inside edge onto boot as he pushes forward
back of a length and slanted in from outside off. Left alone
good length and straightening from an off stump line. Blocks from the crease
full and just outside off, driven to extra cover. That looked like an offcutter
good length and a touch outside off. Tapped to extra cover from the crease
good length at off stump, squeezed off the outside half of the bat. That kept low
back of a length outside off, nudged through point off the outside half
good length and just outside off, steered to backward point off the outside half
in at leg stump, deflected behind square on the leg side
good length and in at leg stump, defended to short leg off the back foot

lbw decision reviewed. Faf trapped on the back foot against this indipper. He's struck in front of leg stump. That's close actually. Not climbing too high, although Faf is in the air....yes, it's umpire's call. Would have stayed out if it was given, but it wasn't. India retain the review
full and wide outside off, drilled to extra cover. Lots of dust as that ball pitched
good length at off stump, shapes away slightly. Tapped to extra cover off the toe end
good length just outside off, taps it on the up to mid-off and steals the single. Philander labours to it at the other end. That's 200
good length and in at off stump, defended to extra cover
beats the outside edge it appears. Yes. There was a big sound of a nick though. Length ball cuts away rapidly outside off and he chases it
good length and in at off stump, defended on the front foot
good length and in at leg stump. Flicks the pad and goes through to Parthiv
back of a length on off stump, defended off the back foot
good length ball fired in at leg stump. Watchfully poked to midwicket
full at middle stump, some late swing in. Flicked straight to midwicket
inside edge as he chases an offcutter wide outside off. Rolls through to the keeper. He was looking to drive
good length outside off, left alone
inside edge lobs wide of backward short leg. Looks to pull this short one outside off, drags it onto his pad
good length on off, pushed back to the bowler
clips it off his ankle after leaping up against this short ball pitching outside leg. Not. Rising. At. All. Pandya bowling a similar pace to Philander
short ball, fired down leg. Lets that pass
full and just outside off, left alone
good length ball skids between bat and pad, and past off stump. At shin height.
short ball outside off, gets on top of the bounce, swivels and hooks to deep square
good length and in at the pads, nudged to fine leg from the crease
full and in at off stump, defended solidly on the front foot
overpitched outside off, driven firmly to extra cover. Classy shot
back of a length outside off, dabbed to gully
slower ball at a length just outside off. Defended off the back foot
chips wide of backward short leg. Another offcutter. Loops in full on the pads. He's early on the flick and nowhere near the ball as it pitches
offcutter, good length and just outside off. Driven back to the bowler.

deflected through square leg off the pads as he misses this full one angled into leg stump

backward short leg moves to his left, Vern gets on the back foot and clips this aerially to his right. Single to fine leg

falls short of midwicket as Faf pushes out in front of his body. Length ball on middle stump. Bat turns in his hands

good length and in at leg stump, pushed to midwicket. Ishant tumbles in his follow through

big deviation as Faf looks for the cut and misses. Parthiv dives to his right and takes it in front of where first slip should have been. The umpire says no. India don't review. Replays show there was no nick. It was the seam being upright that took the ball away after it passed the bat
length on middle, pushed off the back foot

good length, down leg side
misses another cut as this one keeps low. Short and wide, skids through from under the bat
good length on off stump, defended off the back foot

slower ball, taken on the full in front of leg stump. Reaches out, ramps it off the toe end, wide of long leg's right
bouncer on off stump, ducks under it

glove as he shuffles and looks to defend. Pushing out at it. It falls short of leg gully

struck on the pad but he's outside off on the back foot. Still plenty of bounce here for Ashwin
good length outside off, pushed through the open cover region on the front foot

full on leg stump, looks to drive but it stops on him. Dribbles to mid-on

one for our Faf highlights. Back of a length outside off, leans in a touch and taps it on the up through the covers
arm ball, in at middle stump. Defended on the back foot
beaten as he chases this slow loopy one outside off. Spins past the bat and the keeper and slip can't hold on to his right

length ball drifted in outside off, spinning and bouncing away sharply

back of a length just outside off, tapped through cover point

falls in front of short midwicket. Pandya seems impossible to score of, because he's getting neither any pace nor any lift off this surface. Everything skidding low. Rabada looking to flick again at this length ball, can't roll his wrist in time
good length on leg stump, defended on the front foot
good length and just outside off. Skids on at knee height and dies on the keeper
offcutter, full outside off. Drags this to mid-on with a mistimed drive off the inside half
good length outside off, keeps low as he looks to punch. Tapped off the toe-end of the bat

shot. This one comes on nicely and he drills it past the bowler. Overpitched just outside off, no movement.
short ball comes on slowly. Looks to punch through cover, has to laboriously drag it wide of mid-off instead as he plays well in front of the body
short ball just outside off, gets under it and swats it over midwicket

dropped. Faf looks to drive this overpitched ball just outside off. Ends up jamming it out off the toe end and it goes straight into Bumrah's body in his follow through. Tough to react and he's half trying to avoid it. Puts it down
short ball in at middle stump, pulled stylishly to deep square's left
bouncer fired down leg side, left alone
well-directed bouncer. Climbs up at his throat and he has to back away quickly to leave this

ducks under the short ball on middle stump

edged to second slip and it's an easy take. Length ball coming in at off stump, drives on the up with no feet and ends up playing inside the line. Ball dips on Kohli but it's at a comfortable catching height
good length on off stump, defended on the front foot
bouncer follows him as he stands tall on his leg stump guard. He ducks under it
good length and slanted across off stump, left alone
full and in at middle stump, pushed on the up to mid-on
back of a length outside off stump, punched to sweeper cover
back of a length outside off, crunched on the up to sweeper cover. Denies the run again
slower ball, good length and wide outside off. Checks his shot after shaping to drive that

sticks out the right hand takes this in his follow through! Deceives him with the slower ball. An offcutter. Full and in at off stump. Faf shapes to drive inside out through extra cover. It pings off the inside half and hangs up for Bumrah who is fully in control this time.
yorker at middle stump, manages to dig it out

back of a length outside off, defended off the back foot
length on off stump, defended off the back foot
back of a length and lifting into the mid-riff. That's Morkel's mid riff, so it's climbing some way. He looks to punch off the back foot and it pings the shoulder of the bat
shot. Gloriously put away from Morkel. Short of a length and sliding into leg stump again. Gets on top of the bounce this time and whips it to midwicket's left
bouncer and angled down leg side. Looks to hook, beaten
another bouncer. Another attempted hook. Flies over the edge
deflected over the slip cordon off the helmet. Bouncer, too quick for his third attempted hook.
bouncer at leg stump. Looks to hook, beaten
yorker on middle stump, brings the bat down hurriedly, squeezes it out to deep square off the inside edge
boom! Backs away, exposes the stumps, and slaps this on the up over the non-striker. Bumrah bowls a length ball coming into him and he keeps it nice and simple. Superb shot
good length at middle stump, defended on the front foot
tossed up outside off, inside edge on the forward defence

gets great connection on the slog but he's found long-on. Tossed up at middle stump, he ends the solid batsman charade and swings with his front foot out of the way. Long-on was a few yards in and had to leap to take this with a reverse cup. Well connected, but flat enough to keep that fielder in the game
back of a length and nipping away outside off. Follows with his hands and jabs it through point
beats the outside edge as he hangs this up outside off. Swinging away. Rahul rooted to the crease and chasing a very wide one
good length and shaping away from off stump. Drops it into the off side and wants a single. Vijay says no
good length and in the corridor with some shape away. Big stride forward to defend

back of a length and just outside off. Looks to close the face but it dribbles down the pitch

dies on the keeper as he lets this go. A length ball slammed into the turf outside off

good length and swinging away outside off, left alone

mid-on slips on his heels and is on the floor with a split. Vijay escapes as he looks to take a dangerous run. Length ball on middle, nervous calling after tapping it straight to the fielder. Rabada over there

back of a length and bending away outside off, left alone
short and in at the chest, defended into the pitch
good length and just outside off, defended on the front foot
shot. Back of a length just outside off. Transfers the weight to get behind this and punches it handsomely through point
back of a length wide outside off, left alone
short and wide outside off, sliced to deep point
good length and in the corridor. Drops it into the covers with soft hands and calls confidently
good length and keeping low just outside off stump, goes on the back foot and taps it to mid-on
good length and shaping away from off stump. Goes on the back foot and defends right under his eyes

well played. This is a full outswinger, starting on middle and leg. He follows it closely and defends on the front foot
anxious prod as he decides to leave late. This jumps and runs into the off side off the face of the bat

short ball outside off, forces a leap from QDK. Vijay happy to leave

full and shaping away from off stump. Defended on the front foot

good length outside off, sweetly timed jab on the up. Straight to extra cover
lazy poke away from the body. Length ball outside off, no feet at all as he chases this. Big gap between bat and pad. It rolls into the leg side
short ball in the corridor, defended on the back foot
good length and slanting in from outside off. Left alone

shot. Straight to extra cover. Leans in nicely to this full one outside off but can't find the gap

oh dear that is a terrible shot. Short of a length outside off. Half punch, half cut. A nothing jab in the end - ends up like a slice. It's a hard one to describe. The only thing that's clear is that he was very, very nervous playing that shot. Backward point didn't have to move

short and wide outside off, left alone
back of a length, angling into off stump, blocked to mid-off
full outside off, gets forward and across and defends to mid-off - argument could be made that he didn't need to play at that, but this is how he plays
shortish outside off, stops on him a bit. Was shaping for a proper punch, but adjusted and just played a defensive push into the covers instead
what a delivery. On the fuller side of a good length, angling into off stump and leaving him late. Looked to push towards mid-on, maybe, and got a thick edge that rolled away wide of gully
back of a length on off stump, shuffles across and tucks it to the right of square leg
shortish, sixth-stump line, Pujara isn't going to play at those
back of a length, shapes away from a fifth-stump line, left alone
shortish, angling into off stump. Hops to ride the bounce and defends it back to Morkel
oh man, how well did Kohli play that. A shooter from a shortish length - goes through at knee height towards off stump. Somehow jams his bat down and it hits very, very low on the blade
fullish now, wide of off stump, left alone
length ball, sixth-stump line, left alone

similar ball to the previous one, on the fuller side of a good length and fairly wide of off stump. Kohli leaves again. The funny thing is how high Morkel is getting these fuller balls to carry - de Kock took this one at head height
full, too straight, clips it off his pads crisply and beats Morkel throwing himself to his right after sprinting from long leg
once again on the pads, this time he flicks it straight towards Morkel and can only get one for the shot
length ball angling into the fourth-stump channel. Good stride forward to defend into the covers
shortish, fourth-stump line. Rides the bounce nicely and defends into the covers
back of a length outside off, a little wider than the previous ball, defended towards cover

gone, lbw, that was unplayable. Went wide of the crease, hit that Bumrah spot, got that Bumrah angle into the stumps, and that Bumrah low bounce too. Was jumping across, playing for the bounce all the muscle memory built up over all these years must have made him expect, and the ball hits him low, just around the knee-roll. The umpire's finger goes up immediately, and he reviews - hoping against hope. It's crashing into middle stump, however, and Kohli must walk back. South Africa have the big wicket, and 287 is a long, long way away
ooh, that nipped back from outside off. Pujara is stuck on the crease, the length did it, and the ball sneaks past the inside edge of his defensive shot and hits his thigh pad
length ball, fifth-stump line, left alone
fullish, fifth-stump line, Pujara leaves again
length ball, even wider outside off, Pujara leaves again
fullish, angling too far down leg for Pujara to be able to flick
shortish, wiiiide outside off, Pujara leaves again
length ball, sixth-stump line, left alone
back of a length outside off, Parthiv leaves again

shortish, a bit of extra bounce and that's come back into Parthiv too. Was on the jump, looking to fend it away into the leg side, and the ball sneaked past his inside edge and hit him on the chest. He's gone down, and looks in quite a bit of pain

one hits him on the chest, the next one, from a not dissimilar length, creeps through at shin height, towards off stump. Somehow Parthiv keeps it out. He was jumping, initially, and then he jammed his bat down in a hurry and made just enough contact
full, angling into off stump, jabbed to midwicket, went off the inside half of the bat. Was looking to hit through mid-on, I think
back of a length close to off stump, keeps slightly low again but he plays it well, defends into the covers
length ball angling into off stump, defended to midwicket
too full, on leg stump, clipped to long leg
length ball angling into a fourth-stump line, clipped to mid-on - hung in the air until some three feet from the fielder, Philander

ooh, this one seams away after pitching on a good length in the fourth-stump channel. Beats Pujara's outside edge, but he did well not to push at it away from his body. Whoa, Ultra-edge shows a small spike as the ball passes Pujara's edge. No one appealed - de Kock started to but aborted his appeal quickly
back of a length on off stump, defended to midwicket
fullish, angling down leg, Pujara leaves it
good length and in at off stump, leaps to defend into the leg side

energetic appeal from South Africa as Patel looks to whip a length ball on leg stump. QDK takes it down leg side and the umpire turns it down for caught behind. They won't review. That was off the pad, replays show
back of a length just outside off, climbs at him as he defends on the back foot
beats the outside edge. Looks to defend in the corridor as this climbs up again. Slight noise. No appeal
back of a length on middle stump, defended on the back foot
slices aerially through the covers. Full and coming in outside off. Not to the pitch of this
full on middle stump, flicks it in front of deep square leg and calls for two immediately
good length on off stump, defended on the back foot
short ball just outside off, defended to point off the back foot
good length and wide outside off, left alone
short ball climbing up at off stump, defended nicely. Gets on top of the bounce and takes the bottom hand off
good length at middle stump, defended to midwicket
full and just outside off, hangs the bat out and squeezes it past gully off the outside edge
whew. Climbs viciously into him from outside off. He thinks of defending on the back foot but that's come in so sharply, he can't do anything but leave
good length and in at off stump. Poked down the pitch with an angled bat and hard hands
back fo a length and fired down leg side, he jumps away from it happily
full on middle stump, driven to mid-on
overpitched just outside off, driven firmly back at the bowler who picks up and throws it back. Parthiv had wandered marginally outside the crease. Had to evade that throw
back of a length and pushed through flat outside off. Rooted to the crease as he stabs late and away from the body to get this into the covers
good length and in the rough. Kicks up as he pushes forward to defend. He's taking them on the body, whoever the bowler
overpitched just outside off, driven on the bounce to short extra cover
floated up full in the rough outside off. Defended on the front foot
good length outside off, dead-batted into the pitch
good length outside off, leans in, defends neatly into the leg side
challenges the inside edge straight away. Length ball coming in at off stump, defended to midwicket off the inside half
just misses off stump as Pujara leaves. Back of a length and banged in wide outside off, but this comes in sharply and doesn't climb as much as he expects. Climbs marginally over
length outside off, pushed into the point region with soft hands
good length on off stump, leaps up to defend into the off side
short ball just outside off. Short enough for him to duck
back of a length just outside off, dabs it off the outside half.  Beats Morkel's slo-mo dive at backward point
poor start from him. Short and wide outside off. Doesn't climb too much but Pujara has judged it well and opens the face to find the third man boundary
good length and swinging a long way out from a corridor line, left alone
full outswinger just outside off, taps it wide of mid-off with a turning bat
short of a length and wide outside off, keeps low and he mistimes the back foot punch
good length on off stump, slight shape in. Punched back to the bowler on the up
ankle height but swinging down leg side. Short of a length on leg stump. Not finding his line. QDK lunges and gets a hand on it
back of a length and skidding low in the corridor, defended watchfully off the back foot
back of a length and in at middle stump, defended solidly on the back foot
back of a length at off stump, nicely behind the line to defend towards mid-on
short of a length outside off, jumps to smother the bounce, defends to point

good length and just outside off. Looks to drive on the up and gets it to mid-on as the bat turns. Philander throws at the striker's stumps and it deflects down leg side. Amla is backing up, he dives to his right to save a possible boundary. But he can't stop them from saving a single
back of a length outside off, pushed wide of third slip with an open face

Pujara is diving for his life at the striker's end as AB's throw comes in. He's risked a third. He looks to be out...yes, replays confirm it. Pujara is out run out for the second time in the Test. Well it certainly looks that way. The umpire is confirming with multiple angles...he's taking some time with it too...His bat is on the line as the bail comes off. It's not behind it...there it is. Don't know why it took so long. Parthiv had nudged this ball through gully, they'd picked up two and AB was chasing it from third slip. Picked up, swiveled, threw it on the bounce. QDK was quick with his hands as he broke the stumps. It was Ngidi who put in a slide at the boundary and parried the ball back to AB, chasing it from backward point.
good length and in at leg stump, can't get bat on the flick. Deflected wide of square leg off the pad
back of a length and zipping into the corridor from wide outside off. Beats the inside edge at knee height. Can't find the off stump
good length and coming in at off stump, pushes on the front foot this time and defends off the inside half
length outside off, pushed to point on the front foot
good length on off stump, spits up at him as he looks to defend. Poked into the leg side
back of a length and wide outside off, wafts and misses
bouncer at an off stump line, ducks under it
short of a length just outside off, pushed into the covers
shot. Length ball slides through outside off, he leans in and drills this wide of mid-off on the up
back of a length in the corridor, flicked to square leg off the back foot
good length and wide outside off, beaten on the outside edge as he defends
good length and shaping away outside off, left alone
good length and just outside off, defended solidly on the front foot
good length and swinging away outside off. Hangs the bat out, gets it to run past slip off the outside half
good length and keeping low at middle stump. Defended on the front foot to mid-off
good length and swinging away outside off, left alone
back of a length on middle stump, clipped to deep square off the hips
short one climbing in at off stump, gets on top of the bounce and pushes it wide of square leg
back of a length just outside off, pushed to extra cover on the up
shot. Lovely shot. Full ball angled in towards off stump. Stands tall and creams this on-drive past the non-striker
good length and just outside off, defended into the point region

oh Morne you beauty! He has pulled off a screamer at fine leg! Wow. Sprints to his right, lunges out with his big levers and manages to keep his elbow from slamming into the ground. That's all about balance from Morne - holds his hands up in the air as he slides on his hips. Short ball outside off, Parthiv gets behind the line and launches the hook shot. No chance of keeping that down because he's not on top of it, so he looks to go big. He hasn't connected well enough. Morkel's team mates are static when it's in the air...they're olympic sprinters when he's held on
full on middle stump, driven on the up to mid-on
stunning shot. Full ball in at middle stump, reaches the pitch and clips this cleanly over midwicket, with the trailing leg raised to add to the flair. Glorious
good length and sliding low at middle stump, defended on the front foot
good length and in at middle stump, defended off the back foot
short and wide outside off, slices to third man's right
good length on middle stump, driven on the up to mid-on
good length on off stump, defended on the front foot to extra cover
good length ball bowled wide outside off. Chases with no feet. Beaten
short of a length wide outside off, tapped to point with no feet again
full and in at off stump, driven to mid-on. Wasn't to the pitch of that
good length and wide outside off, leans in and guides this through backward point and AB can't pull it back in
back of a length just outside off, chopped into the turf towards point
good length and wide outside off, walks into it and runs it out to third man
floated full and into the rough outside leg, kicked away
full outside leg, padded
lobbed into the rough again, meets the pad
full and just outside leg, leans in and defends
full outside leg, pushed back to the bowler
length and into the rough, deflected to short fine off the thigh guard
good length on off stump, shuffles and defends into the off side
big outside edge as he looks to defend on the front foot. That lifted up at him and flew past second slip. Maharaj gets there from his fly slip position and pulls it back in with his right hand
back of a length at off stump, defended from the crease
walks across and flicks aerially past midwicket. Back of a length and coming into him. Gets two to deep square's left
back of a length and into middle stump, shovelled to fine leg
good length and just outside off. Straightens past the outside edge as he pushes on the front foot
full and in the rough. Reaches out and sweeps along the floor to long leg's right
good length outside leg, looks to defend, it pings into the point area off the pad
tossed up on leg stump, defended on the front foot
length outside off deflected wide of silly point off the front pad
shot. It's dropped short at an off stump line. Dabs it to deep backward point with an open face
good length on middle stump, steps out and defends down the pitch
back of a length outside off, left alone
back of a length at off stump, defended on the back foot

QDK leaps to his right and takes it one-handed. Ngidi wins the Pandya battle. They'd taken fly slip out. He bowled it short and very wide. Pandya has to reach out a long way to try and get it over the cordon with a ramp. Can't manage it. It's a thick outside edge
short ball down leg side, can't get bat on it
short and wide outside off, looks to slice this square. Beaten

review for caught behind. Ashwin struggles to drop his wrists and get away from this bouncer climbing up at him. It looks to have hit something on the way through to the keeper. South Africa have several men indicating it was bicep...but they review anyway. It's nowhere near bat or glove. Decision will stand.
full outside leg stump, defended with the turn into the off side
turns a long way outside off after pitching outside leg. Rohit is backing away and reaching out with a cut. Under-edge can't beat AB at slip
full outside leg stump, swept to long leg
drops it short and spins it wide. Goes on the back foot and hammers it in front of square. Sweeper cleans up to his right
floated up at off stump, driven to long-off
good length on leg stump, pushed back to the bowler on the front foot

outside edge through to the keeper. Well, that's how you get Ashwin most times. Length ball, slight shape away outside off. He looks to drive through the line on the up, hardly a front foot stride in. It's elementary. Ngidi sprints away in delight, he's one away from a five-for on debut
back of a length on off stump, defended on the back foot
short ball outside off. Batsman rises, ball doesn't. Squeezed to cover off the under-edge
short ball outside off, hangs the bat out and is beaten
hooks over short leg and no one there for that shot. Late on the short ball that's climbing up at his grille
stabs it wide of point after reaching out. Short ball wide outside off, thick outside edge lobs between gully and point
full outside leg stump, flicked to midwicket
nicely placed. One fielder behind square on the leg side and he slaps this well to his left. Full ball outside off, sweep is aerial, but it's safe
good length on middle stump, defended on the front foot
superb again. He's enjoying this spin bowling. Tossed up at leg stump, steps out, gets under it and launches it over mid-on with the full face
good length at middle stump, defended to extra cover on the front foot
good length and on off stump, pushed it to point's right on the front foot
short ball at the ribs, gets behind it and drops it into the leg side
short ball just outside off, defended into the covers
good length and in at off stump. Solidly defended into the covers. There's no on there. Everyone but the two slips are back on the boundary
short ball wide outside off, steers it to third man with an upper cut
short ball outside off, pokes it wide of point off the back foot and they steal a tough single . Rohit was diving in. Would have made it
short ball wide outside off, takes it on with the hook. Nowhere near connecting
good length on off stump, driven straight to extra cover
drills it wide of Morkel at long-on who has probably used up all his glamour credits in the field. Tossed up on middle, swings hard, it's flat and dipping wide of Morkel whose dive is beaten
short ball wide outside off, dabbed expertly past slip and they manage to steal the third as backward point gives chase
good length on leg stump, defended with the turn
QDK can't take this down leg side as Rohit leaves. 'Let it go for four' someone says on the stump mic. The fielder pulls it back and Rohit is still at the same end
full on off stump, driven to mid-off
good length and in at off stump, defended off the back foot
clears gully as he walks into this delivery with his arms outstretched. Outside edge sails over AB's attempted one-handed attempt. He's really close in. Nowhere near taking it
back of a length and climbing outside off, beaten on the outside edge
full and swung in at off stump, defended to extra cover on the front foot
swipes from under the bouncer, beaten as it zips past his shoulder
meets the attempted yorker on the full and flicks it to fine leg's left from middle stump
short ball just outside off, tapped to deep point
gets an inside edge that saves him from being trapped right in front. This keeps low off a length and is headed for middle stump. Does well to get the bat down
good length and just outside off, left alone
short of a length and wide outside off, left alone
short ball just outside off, gorgeously carved to deep backward point
good length, in at off stump, climbing away off the surface. Shami's attempted defence is no match
full outside off, doesn't believe in the stride as he looks to drive this wide of mid-off. Pushed to mid-on off the inside half
good length and in at off stump, defends solidly into the open off side
back of a length just outside off, defended off the back foot
back of a length outside off, steered to deep backward point
whew. He's carted this over backward point. Short of a length and wide outside off, chucks his hands at it and it flies to the boundary
full at leg stump, flicked to mid-on's right
good length and in at off stump, driven on the up to long-off
full and wide outside off, left alone
full and wide outside off, driven on the up to deep extra cover
short ball outside off, climbs the bounce and hooks to fine leg's left
bouncer lifts above his head, he doesn't even have to duck
short ball on off stump, defended into the off side
short and slanted across off stump, sliced to third man
nicely controlled. Bouncer slanted down leg side, swivels, gets on top of it, and hooks it very fine
not in control at all this time. Jumps into the off side to try and hook this, there's no room. Deflects it off the glove, over de Kock's left shoulder
short ball on a middle stump line, ducks under it
walks down leg side to create room. Bouncer follows him and he can't get the hook away

dropped at square leg. Hashim Amla jumps up and slightly to his right to try and catch a well-timed pull shot but he can't hold on. Short ball follows him down leg side again and he hits this well. Amla can parry it at best
short and on a middle stump line, ducks under it
short ball at middle stump, makes room and taps it through extra cover with soft hands. Calls for two immediately. Nicely judged
short one on leg stump, gets on his toes and pulls to fine leg
good length on leg stump, backs away and taps it to wide mid-off
has he got a glove on that? No, it appears. Late on this bouncer as it climbs across him. Can't get bat on the hook. There was half an appeal
followed with a short ball down leg again. Places the hook straight to fine leg
good length on middle stump, nicely timed tap on the up past the non-striker. Won't get a run for it
inside edge onto pad as he backs away to try and hook

looks like AB has taken it! Yes, it's clean! Superb. Loses control of a hook - it's a difficult pitch to get that shot right every time. Backing into the off side, manages to get under it and there's no room. Top edge hangs some 20 yards in front of AB at fine leg. He sprints quickly, goes low with a slide to pouch this and then gets up gracefully to toss the ball up and volley it in celebration
bouncer from around the wicket, ducks under it
yorker at off stump, jams it into the extra cover area
short ball on a middle stump line, watches it closely and leaps into the off side to let it go
short ball on middle stump, defended off the back foot
fly slip doesn't have the wings to reach this. Length ball coming in at off stump. He backs away and pulls out the old swipe across the line. Leading edge sails to that fielder's left

five wickets for Ngidi. What a show on debut fo this guy. He's hit India hard. Back of a length ball fired in at a middle stump line. Shami backing away again to try and make room for a slog. Ends up slicing it straight to Morkel who takes it with a reverse cup at mid-on. Standing ovation from the dressing room for Ngidi
length on middle stump, defended from the crease
bouncer on leg stump, ducks under it
outside edge past second slip. Do they have a few of AB out there? He's after this and he slides to pull it back in. With grace, as always. This was angled across off stump on a length
bouncer up at the left shoulder, plonks the front leg across and looks to hook. Beaten
good length at middle stump, defended off the back foot
bouncer on a middle stump line, hurriedly sways away from it
short ball climbing in at middle stump, jumps into the leg side and squeezes this to gully
yorker nicely dug out. Speared in at leg stump. He gets the front leg out of the way and jams the bat into it
short ball on middle stump, arches backwards and lets it go
full ball in at off stump, arches back a touch, no forward stride. Opens the face and slices it wide of point
short ball wide outside off, swings hard across the line, beaten

Philander lunges forward and gets his hands under it at mid-off. South Africa have won the series. Full on off stump, Bumrah's weight going backwards as he pokes with hard hands. It's a feeble chip, dying on Philander. He takes it. Six for Ngidi
